skills.label: Pikachu
skills.description: Pikachu is a fictional character in the Pokemon franchise. He is a small, yellow mouse-like pokemon with a long tail and a round face. He is known for his ability to generate electricity.

skills.label: Doctor Strange
skills.description: Doctor Strange is a fictional character in the Marvel Comics universe. He is a powerful wizard who uses his abilities to protect the world from evil forces.

skills.label: Burning Flame
skills.description: Burning flame represents the fiery passion of a person or a place.

skills.label: Krishna
skills.description: Krishna is a Hindu god of power, wisdom, and knowledge.

skills.label: Mandala
skills.description: A mandala is a circular pattern of lines and symbols used in Hinduism and Buddhism to represent spiritual guidance and harmony.

skills.label: Parrot
skills.description: Parrots are a group of birds that are known for their ability to mimic human speech and gestures.

skills.label: Shiva
skills.description: Shiva is a Hindu god of love, peace, and prosperity.
